a.title: New Student Online Enrollment for Fall 2020 is Now Open!

div.a: New Student Online Enrollment for Fall 2020 is Now Open!

div.img:
The Food Service Department of Fairview School District is providing free lunch to students and siblings under age 18 in our district during our school closure. Grab n Go meals will be available for pick up at Fairview Middle School from 11:30 am through 1:00 pm. (Look for the yellow Fairview School District van.)
Click here to access the order form. Please place orders by 6pm the day before for the week of April 20, 2020. Please identify how many lunches are required for each day for the period Monday, April 20, 2020, through Friday, April 24, 2020.
If you are unable to access the Schoology link, you may call 814-474-3170 and leave a voice message with your last name and number of lunches requested for each day.
We encourage families to continue to be proactive in reducing the risk of coronavirus by not congregating at the pick-up site once your meal has been distributed, continuing to washing your hands often and staying home if you are sick.
